name: Stable Diffusion XL Image Generator
author: AWENK AUDICO
description: Generates images from text prompts using local Stable Diffusion XL models.

properties.label: AI Model
properties.description: Nama folder model yang ada di dalam direktori 'ai_models/image'. CONTOH: 'stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0'. JANGAN gunakan 'default'.

properties.label: Prompt
properties.default: a cinematic photo of a raccoon astronaut, professional photography, 8k

properties.label: Negative Prompt
properties.default: blurry, worst quality, low quality, cartoon, anime

properties.label: Output Folder
properties.description: The folder where the generated image will be saved. If empty, a default folder will be used.

properties.label: Output Filename Prefix (Optional)
properties.description: A custom prefix for the saved image file.

output_schema.name: data.image_path
output_schema.description: The full local path to the generated image file.
